text: The Beekeeper is a 2024 American action crime thriller movie starring Jason Statham. 2024 in movies ==Cast== * Jason Statham as Mr. Clay ==Blu-ray Release== * April 10, 2024 in Australia. * May 6, 2024 in the United Kingdom.
